survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Coworking Spaces
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from members of coworking spaces to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use this coworking space?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use this coworking space?

questions.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following amenities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the coworking space?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the coworking space?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your coworking experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your coworking experience?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this coworking space to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple single-choice question to gauge overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this coworking space to others?
